p: Sideritis lotsyi Pit. contains tetracyclic diterpenes (ent-kaur-16-ene and epicandicandiol 7 β-monoacetate-18-palmitate), rhoiptelenol, hydrocarbon ent-trachylobane, amyrin, trachinodiol, a rare diterpene 16 β,18-dihydroxy-ent-atisane, and 5-hydroxy-3,7,4′-trimethoxyflavone, but the content is different between S. lotsyi and S. lotsyi var. mascaensis [ 96]. S. lotsyi var. mascaensis extracts were studied in a comprehensive analysis for the antimicrobial activity, toxicity, and anti-inflammatory and analgesic proprieties.
